task.title: How to Troubleshoot Error Messages
task.shortdesc: These are steps to follow when your TRS-80 microcomputer displays an error message.

context.note: If more than one thing is wrong, the computer might wait until you correct the first error before displaying the second error message.
context.p: When an error message is displayed:

step.cmd: Look up boot errors and operating system errors in the following tables and take the recommended actions. See your application program manual for explanations of application program errors.
Reset the computer and try the operation again.
Remove all diskettes from drives, turn off the computer, wait 15 seconds, and turn it on again.
If you tried all these remedies and continue to get an error message, contact a Radio Shack Service Center.
